sn44.4:1: As above down to:… "What now, friend, is the cause and reason why this has not been declared by the Blessed One?"
sn44.4:2: "But, friend, one who knows and sees form … feeling … perception … volitional formations … consciousness as it really is, who knows and sees its origin, its cessation, and the way leading to its cessation, does not think: ‘The Tathāgata exists after death’ … or ‘The Tathāgata neither exists nor does not exist after death.’
